name: Battle Of Cosmos
description:
You control the blue flagged ships and planets. With the planets and moons you produce gold which you can use to buy buildings and the planets/moons produce ships which are used to take over more planets in this quick paced Sci-Fi RTS. 

The game has a campaign with 30 levels, 7 buildings, a Sandbox generator with up to 5 AI players and the game is completely free! Altough a donation would really help me out and motivate me to make more levels, campaigns and buildings for the game.

Controls:

Camera: WASD/arrow keys and zoom with the scroll wheel

Select: Left-click 

Select multiple: Hold down shift while clicking

Hold down left-click and drag to select in an area

Attack: Right-Click

Attack with half of ships: Hold down control while right-clicking

Cheat code to unlock all levels and everything in the game: "ulevels" (type it in any scene in the game)
